bibl.title: The Earliest Known Fragment of the New Testament.
bibl.note: On P. Ryl. III, 457 (= van Haelst 462). - Reprints newspaper articles on the subject by C.H. Dodd in the Manchester Guardian, 13 Nov. 1935, and by A. Deissmann in Deutsche Allgemeine Zeitung of 3 Dec. 1935.
bibl.seg: The Earliest Known Fragment of the New Testament.

On P. Ryl. III, 457 (= van Haelst 462). - Reprints newspaper articles on the subject by C.H. Dodd in the Manchester Guardian, 13 Nov. 1935, and by A. Deissmann in Deutsche Allgemeine Zeitung of 3 Dec. 1935.
